00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00030 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/simbio_dbop.inc.php';
00031 
00032 if (isset($_POST['resync'])) {
00033     // update stock item data against bibliographic and item data
00034     $update_q = $dbs->query('UPDATE stock_take_item AS sti
00035         LEFT JOIN item AS i ON sti.item_code=i.item_code
00036             LEFT JOIN mst_coll_type AS ct ON i.coll_type_id=ct.coll_type_id
00037             LEFT JOIN mst_location AS loc ON i.location_id=loc.location_id
00038             LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id
00039                 LEFT JOIN mst_gmd AS g ON b.gmd_id=g.gmd_id
00040         SET sti.title=b.title, sti.gmd_name=g.gmd_name,
00041             sti.classification=b.classification, sti.call_number=b.call_number,
00042             sti.coll_type_name=ct.coll_type_name');
00043     if (!$dbs->error) {
00044         $aff_rows = $dbs->affected_rows;
00045         // record to log
00046         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'stock_take', 'Stock Take Re-Synchronization');
00047         echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00048         echo 'parent.$(\'resyncInfo\').update(\''.$aff_rows.' Stock Take\\\'s Item Data Successfully Synchronized!\');'."\n";
00049         echo 'parent.$(\'resyncInfo\').setStyle( {display: \'block\'} );'."\n";
00050         echo '</script>';
00051     } else {
00052         echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00053         echo 'parent.$(\'resyncInfo\').update(\'Stock Take\\\'s Item Data FAILED to Synchronized!\');'."\n";
00054         echo 'parent.$(\'resyncInfo\').setStyle( {color: \'red\', display: \'block\'} );'."\n";
00055         echo '</script>';
00056     }
00057     exit();
00058 }
00059 
00060 echo '<div class="infoBox">'.__('Re-synchronize will only update current stock take\'s item data. It won\'t update any new bibliographic or item data that were inserted in the middle of stock take proccess')."\n";
00061 echo '<hr size="1" />'."\n";
00062 echo '<form action="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'" method="post" target="resyncSubmit">'."\n";
00063 echo '<input type="submit" name="resync" value="'.__('Resynchronize Now').'" class="button" />'."\n";
00064 echo '</form>'."\n";
00065 echo '<iframe name="resyncSubmit" style="width: 0; height: 0; visibility: hidden;"></iframe>'."\n";
00066 echo '</div>';
